article_title: Senators Say Walgreen Domicile Move Like 'Giving Up On America'

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Dick Durbin, the second-most powerful U.S. Senator in Washington, is upping the ante and “chiding” a sudden flurry of U.S. companies considering taking advantage of a loophole that allows them to avoid higher corporate taxes here by reincorporating overseas. Amid mounting Congressional criticism of so-called inversions, the Illinois Democrat, No. 2 [...]
